forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 73. North northwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then patchy fog. Partly cloudy, with a low around 55. Northwest wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
